jd: From: Rahman, Webster Tech Solutions INC rahman@webstertechsolutions.com Reply to: rahman@webstertechsolutions.com Position: Business Analyst (Financial Domain experience OR Capital market domain)Location: New York – (Day 1 onsite) Rate: $50/hr on C2C Domain Experience Mandatory: Financial Domain experience OR Capital market domain Skill Set:Overall 10+ Experience5+ years of experience in Requirement Gathering and Elaboration session with the Financial CustomersHands on Experience in Engaging in customer discussion to understand the business requirementsExperience in Capital market domain- especially trading, listing of securities, regulatory aspects of capital market - like compliance and reporting can be added to the list Activities:Participate in requirement gathering and Process/User Journey design thinking workshops.Forecast and suggest the Future Roadmap and Functional scalability for RequirementManage functional product backlog and supports in maintaining functional designs.Creating, Managing User stories and validating development & test scenarios.Organize Show and tell sessions to business,Knowledge transfer to development and testing team.
